featured.text: Many ordinary clocks are hard to read early in the morning, deceiving students of the correct time, __22__ causing them to be late for school.
On land as in the sea, living lights can be deceiving.

definition.zh_def: 欺騙，誤導他人使其相信不真實的事情。
definition.en_def: To cause someone to believe something that is not true; to mislead.
definition.example: He tried to deceive her with a false story.
